pageTitle: View London with Emirates Air Line and Thames Clippers
description: View London with Emirates Air Line and Thames Clippers

breadcrumbs.title: View London with Emirates Air Line and Thames Clippers

title.title: View London with Emirates Air Line and Thames Clippers

texts: Partnership with Thames Clippers sees exclusive packages for families to enjoy and discover London from both on and above the river
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Emirates Air Line marks two years of operation having carried more than 3.9 million passengers"]}
As the Emirates Air Line clocks up its second year of operation, the cable car has teamed up with Thames Clippers to offer exclusive joint packages to fly over and glide down the Thames.

The packages provide a range of family-friendly options for a great summer day cruising by river on Thames Clippers and at altitude on the Emirates Air Line. Individuals, families or groups can buy river passes allowing unlimited hop-on, hop-off travel to 15 piers along the Thames, as well as a 360° trip on the Emirates Air Line and access to the Emirates Aviation Experience.

Special deals are also available offering a single or return journey from central London or Greenwich to enjoy the Emirates Air Line Experience.A family of up to five people - two adults and three children - can purchase a 'Roamer package' for £50.
Adult tickets begin at less than £14 while children can travel for under £8.
Tickets are available for purchase from the Thames Clippers website and from Emirates Air Line terminals and will shortly be available via Thames Clippers' new ticketing app.

Since opening two years ago the Emirates Air Line has carried over 3.9 million passengers scoring highly on customer surveys and it is strategically located to support large regeneration schemes of both sides of the river at Greenwich (south side) and the Royal Docks (north side).
TfL's Head of the Emirates Air Line, Danny Price, said:

'Since its inaugural flight, the Emirates Air Line has carried nearly four million passengers, linking two areas of the capital that are the focus of ambitious regeneration schemes. We are always looking for ways to enhance the passenger experience and this latest offer includes a great value family day out exploring London by river and air.'
Thames Clippers' CEO, Sean Collins, said:

'We're really excited to be partnering with Emirates Air Line to offer two of the most relaxing and pleasurable ways of travelling in one great package. It really does offer the best ways to see and explore London.'

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Images of the Emirates Air Line are available \u003ca href=\"http://www.tflpressgallery.co.uk/ \"\u003ehere\u003c/a\u003e ","Media visits to the Emirates Air Line can be arranged by Tamara Salhab in the TfL Press Office please contact her on 020 3054 8985.","Information on visiting the Emirates Air Line is available at: \u003ca href=\"http://www.emiratesairline.co.uk/\"\u003ehttp://www.emiratesairline.co.uk/\u003c/a\u003e ","The Emirates Air Line customer satisfaction surveys are available on request and online: \u003ca href=\"http://www.tfl.gov.uk/corporate/modesoftransport/26168.aspx\"\u003ehttp://www.tfl.gov.uk/corporate/modesoftransport/26168.aspx\u003c/a\u003e ","Information on the joint packages with Thames Clippers are available at: http://www.thamesclippers.com/whats-on-discounts/emirates-and-thames-clippers-joint-ticket-packages","The 15 piers included in the package are - Royal Arsenal Woolwich, North Greenwich Pier (for The O2 and Emirates Air Line), Greenwich, Masthouse, Greenland, Canary Wharf, Hilton Docklands Riverside, Tower Millennium, London Bridge City, Bankside, Blackfriars, Embankment, London Eye, Millbank and St George Wharf."]}
